string-array.name: mates_plus_dates_hints
string-array.item: I wouldn\'t want to go to the park on a date, it\'d be cold and it might be wet

string-array.name: draconia_trainers_hints
string-array.item: The day sky is blue and the night sky is black.

string-array.name: jazz_band_solos_hints
string-array.item: Evan, Steve, and Will are men.
Trombones and trumpets are brass instruments.
